name: PIX EGG - EVIL EGG
description:
Welcome to V1 PIX! 

Burn me to receive a gene■rative 1/1 PIX in your wallet about 48 hours later.
■
You can burn items before ■burning the egg in order to hatch a PIX with equipped items.

If you send $EVIL or $DARK tokens to address "sacrifice.tez" before burning, your next burned egg will be supercharged and■ receive special powers, traits and graphic effects.
■
Chances to receive epic traits depend on the amount of token you send to sac■rifice.tez
1.000 $EVIL or■ 1.000 $DARK will g■rant you 100% ■chance of receiving epic traits.

These tokens also improve chances to receive better items when hat■ching with equipped items.

Egg ra■rities have multiple effevcts:
-More chances to drop rare traits like specialheads, and epic traits like the evil wings
-Better items, and better ■■item qualities
-More ■chances to r■■eceive Perks at birth, like being a mecha, ghost, or holy PIX
-More chances to receive Items at birth
-More chances to be an Immortal, meaning you can burn the PIX as muc■h as you want, to change its cloth
-Special frames depending on egg rarity
-I am different.

Don't worry, there's a little chance to receive ANY trait■ even if you don't sacrifice tokens.
■
Hatch proces■■s is manually triggered and may take up to 48 hours.

Your PIX may also receive Perks, changing its properties and user interactions.
